# Table 1

```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.align='center', out.width='1\\linewidth'}
path = (here("final_analyses", "output",
                                 "plots", "manuscript", # File path
                                 "table1.pdf"))

knitr::include_graphics(path) # File name
```

# Figure 1

```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.align='center', out.width='1\\linewidth'}
path = (here("final_analyses", "output",
                                 "plots", "manuscript", # File path
                                 "figure1.pdf"))

knitr::include_graphics(path) # File name
```

Point estimates depict the median and interval bars depict 95th quantiles.

# Figure 2

```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.align='center', out.width='1\\linewidth'}
path = (here("final_analyses", "output",
                                 "plots", "manuscript", # File path
                                 "figure2.pdf"))

knitr::include_graphics(path) # File name
```

Panels A and C: Point estimates depict the median. Interval bars depict the 50 and 95% highest density intervals. Panels B and D: Cumulative posterior distributions correspond to the probabilities that the risk difference (RD) is greater than or equal to the effect size on the X‚Äêaxis.
